Class ClientEngineComponentDecorator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.client.components.ClientEngineComponentDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientComponent, Serializable
public class ClientEngineComponentDecorator extends Object implements ClientComponent
Client side component decorator containing info about its engine's power and direction.
